name: Coarse Weightstone
tooltip:
Coarse Weightstone

It takes a lot of work to be the strongest woman alive!  My weight set is getting too light and if I'm too stay fit then I'll need more weights!

Do you think you could bring me some weight stones?  If you do, then I'll give you a Darkmoon Faire ticket.

Requirements:
- Coarse Weightstone x 10
